introduction: 观看地址1：https://vimeo.com/60465577观看地址2：http://www.revistagq.com/videos/50-sombras-de-grey-fashion-film/1601Mine from Alvaro de la HerránAlvaro de la Herrán: GQ Spain proposed a film to me inspired by the characters of the book that I see in all books shops, but it's clear to me that in a contemporary sexual relationship a kiss hides more than a tongue.Director: Álvaro de la HerránShe: Marina JamiesonHe: Garrett NeffD.O.P: Jose Luis SalomónStylism: Inma Barandica & María M.
